ability.name: Buster Shot
ability.description: Fire a massive cannonball at the closest enemy, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage. If they are within @KnockbackRadius@ hexes, knock them back @HexKnockback@ hexes and briefly Stun them.

ability.name: Whimsy
ability.description: Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to target and make them dance for @StunDuration@ seconds. The projectile then bounces to the nearest target, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.

ability.name: Toxic Dart
ability.description: Shoot the closest unpoisoned enemy, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and poisoning them for @DOTDuration@ seconds. Poisoned enemies take <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamagePerSecond@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage each second.

ability.name: Junkyard Titan
ability.description: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @Duration@ seconds. Fire a burst of flames, dealing <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleArmor%)</magicDamage> magic damage in a cone.

ability.name: Titan's Wrath
ability.description:
Passive: Every @PassiveTimer@ seconds and on cast, the next attack deals damage in a 1 hex circle and deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleMR%) bonus magic damage.

Active: Gain @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

ability.name: Stacked Deck
ability.description:
Passive: Attacks deal @ModifiedBonusAPDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage. After every @NumAttacks@rd attack, throw 3 cards in a cone that deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage, reduced by @FalloffDamage*100@% for each enemy they pass through.

Partners in Crime: When you field Graves and Twisted Fate, both gain bonuses

ability.name: Powder Kegs
ability.description: Toss barrels at the 3 nearest enemies and detonate them. They deal <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> damage, reduced by @FalloffDamage*100@% for each barrel in the chain. Barrels reduce their target's Armor by <TFTBonus>@ArmorReduction@</TFTBonus>, increased to <TFTBonus>@CritArmorReduction@</TFTBonus> if the damage critically strikes.

ability.name: Tentacle Smash
ability.description: Restore <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> Health and slam a tentacle, dealing <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to enemies in a line.

ability.name: Heartbreaker
ability.description:
Passive: Attacks ricochet to the highest current Health enemy, dealing @AutoRicochetMutliplier*100@% damage.

Active: Fire waves of bullets that land on the @BaseNumWaves@ nearest enemies. The first wave deals @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage and the rest deal @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage. Every @NumCaststoGainExtraWave@rd cast, increase the number of waves by 1.

ability.name: Soul Furnace
ability.description:
Passive: Takedowns grant @HealthPerTakedown@ permanent max Health. (Total: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT16_Sion_BonusHealth@)

Active: Gain @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. When it breaks, deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleHealth%) magic damage to adjacent enemies.

ability.name: Blood Frenzy
ability.description: Leap to the furthest enemy within @HexSearchRadius@ hexes. For @Duration@ seconds gain increased Move Speed, <TFTBonus>@BonusAD*100@%</TFTBonus> Attack Damage, and <TFTBonus>@ModifiedAttackSpeed@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> decaying Attack Speed.

ability.name: Spinning Axes
ability.description:
Passive: If Draven has an empowered axe in hand, his next attack will throw it. On takedown, gain an Adoration stack, doubled if Draven or Darius scored the kill. Every @TotalTakedown@ Adoration stacks grants @GoldAmount@ Gold. (Adoration Left: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT16_DravenTakedownsRemaining@, Gold Generated: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT16_DravenGoldGenerated@g)

Active: Spin an empowered axe that replaces his basic attack and deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage and returns to Draven after hitting an enemy.

ability.name: Lacerate
ability.description: Swipe and dash around target, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to enemies in the path. Then slam chains on target, dealing <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage in a line. If any enemies are killed, immediately recast this ability, dealing <TFTBonus>@DamageFalloff*100@%</TFTBonus> damage.

ability.name: Double Trouble Bubble
ability.description:
Passive: Damaging an enemy applies 30% Shred for @ShredDuration@ seconds.

Active: Kick @NumEnemies@ bubbles at nearby enemies, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and 30% Chilling them for @SlowDuration@ seconds.

{{TFT_Keyword_Shred}}
{{TFT_Keyword_Chill}}

ability.name: Solar Flare
ability.description:
Passive: Reduce instances of incoming damage by @ModifiedDamageReduction@ (%i:scaleAP%).

Active: Call down sun beams on the @NumEnemies@ nearest enemies, Stunning them for @StunDuration@ second and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage. Wound and 1% Burn them for @IgniteDuration@ seconds..

{{TFT_Keyword_Wound}}
{{TFT_Keyword_Burn}}

ability.name: Incendiary Onslaught
ability.description:
Start with Infernum equipped. On cast, switch to Severum for @ModifiedNumAttacks@ (%i:scaleAP%) attacks.

Infernum: Attacks hit @NumTargets@ enemies and apply @SunderRatio*100@% Sunder for @SunderDuration@ seconds.
Severum: Gain @AttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed and @Omnivamp*100@% Omnivamp. Attacks are replaced with swipes that deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.

{{TFT_Keyword_Sunder}}

ability.name: Starlight's Touch
ability.description:
Passive: All allies gain @MRForAllies@ Magic Resist. Once per combat after dropping below @InvunerabilityHealthThreshold*100@% max Health, gain @PassiveDR*100@% Durability for @InvunerabilityDuration@ seconds.

Active: Gain @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield and grant the @NumAlliesToShield@ lowest Health allies @ModifiedAllyShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. The next @NumEmpoweredAttacks@ attacks deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage.

ability.name: Demacian Standard
ability.description: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Grant all allies <TFTBonus>@ModifiedAttackSpeed@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Attack Speed for @AttackSpeedDuration@ seconds.

ability.name: Power Chord
ability.description: Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to @NumEnemies@ nearby enemies and restore <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> Health to the lowest Health ally.

ability.name: Judgment
ability.description: Spin for @SpinDuration@ seconds, gaining <TFTBonus>@Durability*100@%</TFTBonus> Durability and healing for <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> over the duration. Each second, deal <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to adjacent enemies and reduce their Armor and Magic Resistance by @ArmorMRReduction@.

ability.name: Final Spark
ability.description: Fire a ball of light at the most enemies, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage_Q@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the first @NumQTargets@ enemies hit and Rooting them for @StunDuration@ second. Then fire a beam, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies hit by the ball and <magicDamage>@ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to all other enemies hit.

ability.name: Frostbite
ability.description:
Fire an ice shard at target that deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage. If they are Chilled, the damage Critically Strikes.

{{TFT_Keyword_Chill}}

ability.name: True Ice Arrow
ability.description:
Fire an arrow at target that deals @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to them and @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) damage to adjacent enemies. Targets below @TrueDamageHealthBreakpoint*100@% max Health take true damage instead. 30% Chill all enemies hit for @Duration@ seconds.

Bloodsworn Bond: When you field Ashe and Tryndamere, your strongest copies permanently increase their power on kill.Bloodsworn Bond: Attacks fire a bonus arrow for every @TryndASPerArrow*100@% Attack Damage granted to Tryndamere by Bloodsworn Bond. These arrows deal @SmallArrowDamageFinal@ (%i:TFTBaseAD%) physical damage. (Current Bonus Arrows: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT16_Ashe_CurrentArrows@).

{{TFT_Keyword_Chill}}

ability.name: Unbreakable Frost
ability.description:
Raise shield for @Duration@ seconds, gaining @ModifiedDurability@ (%i:scaleAP%) Durability and redirecting projectiles to towards Braum instead. When hit, deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to nearby enemies and 30% Chill them for @ChillDuration@ seconds.

{{TFT_Keyword_Chill}}

ability.name: Frozen Tomb
ability.description:
Encase target in ice, Stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage. All enemies within 2 hexes of them split @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage. If the target dies, shards fly out and split excess damage between the @NumOverkillEnemies@ nearest enemies.

Chilled enemies take @DamageAmpChilledTargets*100@% more damage from this ability.

{{TFT_Keyword_Chill}}

ability.name: Ultra Mega Fire Kick!!!
ability.description: Launch a fuemigo at target that bounces @NumBounces@ times, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies hit. The last bounce deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedAOEDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies in a @HexRange@ hex radius.

ability.name: Pop Blossom
ability.description:
Leap at target and gain @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Slam down after a brief delay, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within two hexes and 20% Chilling them for @ChillDuration@ seconds.

{{TFT_Keyword_Chill}}

ability.name: Switcheroo!
ability.description: <spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive> After attacking <scaleLevel>@NumAttacks@</scaleLevel> times, switch to Fishbones. While equipped, attacks are replaced with @NumMissiles@ rockets that target random enemies and deal <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage.

ability.name: Ace in the Hole
ability.description: Fire a bullet towards the farthest enemy, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the first enemy it hits. If they die, the bullet ricochets, dealing excess damage to the next enemy hit.

ability.name: Relentless Force
ability.description: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Slam on target, dealing <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to enemies in a @HexRange@ hex range. Every third cast deals <physicalDamage>@ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> damage in a @ThirdCastHexRange@ hex range instead and knocks up enemies hit for @KnockupDuration@ second.

ability.name: Grand Encore
ability.description:
Gain @CrystalsPerCast@ notes. For each one active, deal @ModifiedDamagePerCrystal@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to a nearby enemy.

While holding @CastBreakpoint@ notes on cast, consume them to project a wave of energy. Allies hit restore @ModifiedBigCastHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%) Health. Enemies hit take @ModifiedBigCastDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage, reduced by @BigCastDamageFalloff*100@% for each enemy it's passed through.

ability.name: Sweeping Blade
ability.description:
Dash, then deal @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to adjacent enemies. If only one enemy is hit, deal double damage.

Blade Brothers: When you field Yasuo and Yone, Yasuo assists Yone's casts.Blade Brothers: When Yone casts, your strongest Yasuo blinks to every target Yone hits and deals @YasuoADPercent*100@% %i:TFTBaseAD% physical damage to each.

ability.name: Fox-Fire
ability.description:
Fire @NormalNumBolts@ flames at target, each dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage. Every 3rd cast, fire @SpecialCastNumBolts@ flames split between the target and up to @NumNearbyEnemies@ nearby enemies.

If there are nearby enemies, dash away.

ability.name: Diverting Trickster
ability.description:
Passive: On death, summon a Stone copy with @ModifiedCloneHealth@ (%i:scaleHealth%) Health and Wukong's items.

Active: For 4 seconds, gain @ModifiedDefenses@ (%i:scaleAP%) Armor and Magic Resist. Then spin, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to all enemies within 2 hexes.

ability.name: Stand United
ability.description: Grant <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield to this unit and a nearby damaged ally for @Duration@ seconds.

ability.name: Void Swarm
ability.description: Summon @NumMinions@ Voidlings that each attack a nearby enemy @NumAttacks@ times. Each attack deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.

ability.name: Burrow
ability.description: Dash to the furthest enemy within @EnemySearchDistance@ hexes and deal <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to them. The next @NumAttacks@ attacks hit adjacent enemies and deal <physicalDamage>@ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage.

ability.name: Rupture
ability.description: Restore <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> Health and rupture a 2 hex circle beneath target. After a brief delay, enemies within are knocked up for @KnockupDuration@ seconds and take <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.

ability.name: Caustic Spittle
ability.description: Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to target and reduce their Armor and Magic Resist by <scaleLevel>@ArmorReduction@</scaleLevel>. Adjacent enemies are dealt <TFTBonus>@PercentToSecondaryEnemies*100@%</TFTBonus> of the damage and effect.

ability.name: Enraged Inferno
ability.description:
Erupt the entire battlefield in flames, permanently Burning and Wounding all enemies and dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to each of them over @DamageDuration@ seconds.

Annie's max Mana is reduced by @ManaCostReduction@ for the rest of combat. Subsquent casts launch a fireball at target that deals @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.

{{TFT_Keyword_Burn}}
{{TFT_Keyword_Wound}}

ability.name: Call of the Forge
ability.description:
Summon an elemental from behind the farthest enemy. It 20% Chills enemies hit for @SlowDuration@ seconds and deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to them.

When it arrives, headbutt it and redirect it toward another distant enemy, dealing @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage instead.

{{TFT_Keyword_Chill}}

ability.name: Lamb's Respite
ability.description:
Dash, then create a @HexRadius@-hex radius zone for @Duration@ seconds that prevents allies within from dying. While active, double current Attack Speed and on attack, fire a secondary arrow at a nearby enemy that deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.

When the zone ends, heal all allies for @ModifiedHealPercentage@ (%i:scaleAP%) of damage dealt while it was up and dash away.

ability.name: Arise!
ability.description:
Passive: After witnessing 3 attacks from Azir, Sand Soldiers deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to their target.

Active: Summon a Sand Soldier near target and command them to strike. If @MaxSummons@ Soldiers are already out, they all immediately deal @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage instead.

ability.name: Visions of the End
ability.description:
Throw a Time Bomb on the nearest enemy without one. Time Bombs deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage each second. When the target dies, they explode, dealing @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage in a 1 hex radius and grant Zilean @ManaOnKill@ mana.

If a Time Bomb is on an enemy for @MaxDurationBeforeKill@ seconds and Zilean is alive, the enemy instantly dies.

ability.name: Crowstorm
ability.description: Teleport into the largest cluster of enemies and Stun them for @FearDuration@ seconds. Begin losing @ManaLossPerSecond@ mana per second. While casting, deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamagePerSecond@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage per second to all enemies within a @AOERadius@ hex radius. The closest @NearestEnemies@ enemies take <TFTBonus>@NearestBonusDamage*100@%</TFTBonus> more damage.

ability.name: Dragon's Descent / Flame Breath
ability.description:
Dragon's Descent: Transform into a dragon, gaining @TransformHealth@ max Health. Briefly gain @TransformDurability*100@% Durability and dive-bomb into the largest group of enemies, dealing @ModifiedDivebombDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage in a 3 hex circle.

Flame Breath: Breath fire in a cone for @SpellDuration@ seconds, dealing @ModifiedFireDamagePerSecond@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage each second to enemies hit.

ability.name: Inspirational Might
ability.description:
Passive: Every @NumAttacks@rd attack deals @BonusPassiveDamage@ (%i:scaleMR%) magic damage in a circle around the target.

Active: Dash into the largest group of units and inspire all allies within 2 hexes, granting them @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Then crash down, dealing @ModifiedActiveDamage@ (%i:scaleMR%) bonus magic damage to all enemies with 2 hexes.

ability.name: Devour
ability.description:
Devour target for @BellyDuration@ seconds, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and making them immune to other sources of damage. During this time, gain @DamageReduction*100@% Durability. If they are immune to crowd control, deal @ReducedModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage instead.

If they die while devoured, spit out a random component they were holding or the unit's cost in gold. Otherwise, spit them towards the farthest enemy, briefly Stunning targets on impact.

ability.name: Winter's Wrath
ability.description:
Gain @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Strike in a cone and a line. Enemies hit take @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and are 30% Chilled for @ChillDuration@ seconds. If they are already Chilled, Stun them for @StunDuration@ second.

{{TFT_Keyword_Chill}}

ability.name: The Show Stopper
ability.description: Grab target and slam them forward, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> + <magicDamage>@ModifiedPercentOfTargetMaxHealth@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> of their max Health as magic damage to them. All other enemies within @AoERadius@ hexes take <TFTBonus>@PercentAoEDamage*100@%</TFTBonus> of the total damage.

ability.name: Seismic Slam
ability.description:
Passive: Immune to crowd control effects. Attacks briefly knock up the target and deal @PassivePercentAoE*100@% damage in a 1 hex radius around them.

Active: Slam the ground, dealing @ModifiedSlamDamage@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to ALL enemies, reduced by @EffectReductionPerHex*100@% for each hex from the center (down to @EffectReductionMinimum*100@%.) If this is the first time they've been hit by Seismic Slam this combat, knock them up for up to @StunDuration@ seconds. @NumRocks@ rocks fall around the battlefield, each dealing @ModifiedRockDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to enemies hit.

ability.name: Hextech Arsenal
ability.description:
Passive: Attacks fire a barrage of @NumBullets@ bullets.

Active: Gain @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleHealth%) Shield and begin consuming @ManaCostPerSecond@ mana per second. Each second while casting, fire a laser that deals @ModifiedLaserDamagePerSecond@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage, reduced by @LaserFalloffPerTarget*100@% per enemy hit up to @LaserFalloffCap*100@%. Additionally, launch @ModifiedMissilesPerSecond@ (%i:scaleAS%) missiles split between @RocketNumClosestEnemies@ nearby enemies that each deal @ModifiedMissileDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage.

ability.name: Endless Banquet
ability.description:
Passive: On takedown, gain @AttackSpeedOnTakedown*100@% stacking Attack Speed that decays over @ASDuration@ seconds.

Active: Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage in a 2 hex radius and transform for the rest of combat.

While transformed, gain @ModifiedAttackSpeed@ (%i:scaleAP%) Attack Speed, @PercentMaxHealthGain*100@% max Health, and increased Move Speed. Attacks deal @TrueDamageBase@ bonus true damage, increased by @TrueDamagePerStack@ for each time the same enemy is hit.

ability.name: Poison Trail
ability.description:
Passive: Run around the battlefield, leaving a poison trail that lingers for @PoisonCloudDuration@ seconds. Poison trails deal @ModifiedDamagePerSecond@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage per second to enemies within. Gain @ModifiedManaPerSec@ (%i:scaleAS%) Mana each second.

Active: For @SpellDuration@ seconds, gain increased Move Speed, restore @ModifiedHealPerSecond@ (%i:scaleAP%) Health each second, and gain @ArmorMR@ Armor and Magic Resistance.

ability.name: The Skies Descend
ability.description:
Passive: After dealing ability damage to an enemy, gain Stardust. Stadust makes The Skies Descend more powerful. (Current Stardust: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT16_AurelionSol_Stardust@)

Active: Crash a star on target, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage in a @InitialHexRadius@ hex radius.

Stardust Upgrades:
@StardustThreshold1@: Create a shockwave that deals @ModifiedThreshold1Damage@ (%i:scaleAP%) additional magic damage in a @Threshold1Radius@ Hex radius.@StardustThreshold1@: Create a shockwave that deals @ModifiedThreshold1Damage@ (%i:scaleAP%) additional magic damage in a @Threshold1Radius@ Hex radius.
@StardustThreshold2@: The star crash deals @Threshold2DamageIncrease*100@% more damage.@StardustThreshold2@: The star crash deals @Threshold2DamageIncrease*100@% more damage.
@StardustThreshold3@: Shockwave increases to a @Threshold3Radius@ hex radius.@StardustThreshold3@: Shockwave increases to a @Threshold3Radius@ hex radius.
@StardustThreshold4@: Knock up targets in the star crash for @Threshold4KnockupDuration@ seconds.@StardustThreshold4@: Knock up targets in the star crash for @Threshold4KnockupDuration@ seconds.
@StardustThreshold5@: Shockwave increases to @Threshold5Radius@ radius.@StardustThreshold5@: Shockwave increases to @Threshold5Radius@ radius.
@StardustThreshold6@: The star crash deals @Threshold6BonusDamagePercent*100@% bonus true damage.@StardustThreshold6@: The star crash deals @Threshold6BonusDamagePercent*100@% bonus true damage.
@StardustThreshold7@: Also call down a meteor storm that deals @ModifiedThreshold7Damage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage split between living enemies.@StardustThreshold7@: Also call down a meteor storm that deals @ModifiedThreshold7Damage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage split between living enemies.
@StardustThreshold8@: Summon a black hole at the epicenter, instantly killing enemies within.@StardustThreshold8@: Summon a black hole at the epicenter, instantly killing enemies within.

ability.name: Dark Storm
ability.description:
Passive: Gain @IncreasedAPRatio*100@% more Ability Power from all sources.

Active: Call down a storm of @NumMeteors@ meteors across the battlefield that deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage each. They can innately critically strike. For each one that kills an enemy, permanently gain @APPerKill@ Ability Power. (Permanent Ability Power: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT16_Unit_VeigarBonusAP@% %i:scaleAP%)

ability.name: Wrath of the Void
ability.description:
Passive: Immune to Crowd Control effects. Attacks deal damage in a line on target. If no enemies are in range, dash to the next one and knock up adjacent enemies on arrival.

While in the Void Rift, erupt a tentacle below a random enemy every @TentacleRefreshSeconds@ seconds that knocks them up for @TentacleKnockupDuration@ seconds.

Active: Slam and erect spikes in a 2 hex circle, dealing @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to enemies hit. Then over 3 seconds, spit @NumAcidToShoot@ globs of acid that deal @ModifiedAcidDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage.

ability.name: Decimate
ability.description:
Restore @TotalHealing@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) Health and spin, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to adjacent enemies and applying a stack of Hemorrhage that deals @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage each second for @BleedDuration@ seconds.

If an enemy with Hemorrhage drops below @ExecutePercentPerHemorrhage*100@% Health, slam on them, instantly killing them. (Each stack increases the execute threshold by @SecondaryExecutePercentPerHemorrhage*100@%)

ability.name: Kin of the Stained Blade
ability.description:
Passive: Attacks alternate between dealing @ModifiedBasicAttackADDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) bonus physical damage and @ModifiedBasicAttackAPDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage.

Active: Strike through the most enemies possible within @TooltipHexRange@ hexes, knocking them up for @KnockupDuration@ seconds and dealing @ModifiedPerTargetDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage and @ModifiedPerTargetDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) magic damage. Yone then splits @ModifiedStrikeDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage and @ModifiedStrikeDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) magic damage among all enemies hit.

Blade Brothers: When you field Yasuo and Yone, Yasuo assists Yone's casts.Blade Brothers: When Yone casts, your strongest Yasuo blinks to each target, dealing bonus physical damage.

ability.name: Eternal Hunger
ability.description: Gain <TFTBonus>@AttackSpeed*100@%</TFTBonus> Attack Speed, <TFTBonus>@Omnivamp*100@%</TFTBonus> Omnivamp, increased Move Speed, and deal <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> bonus physical damage on attack for the rest of combat. While this effect is active, takedowns grant Warwick, Jinx, and Vi <TFTBonus>@ModifiedTakedownAttackSpeed@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Attack Speed for @AllyBuffDuration@ seconds.

ability.name: Playful Trickster
ability.description: Become briefly untargetable, then jump to the farthest enemy within @HexRange@ hexes and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies. For the next @NumAttacks@ attacks, gain <TFTBonus>@ASBoost*100@%</TFTBonus> Attack Speed and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedAttackDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> bonus magic damage on hit.

ability.name: Hammer Shock
ability.description: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds and deal <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to target. After a delay, briefly knock them up and deal the damage again. Bucklers fly out from the target, granting @NumShieldedAllies@ nearby allies <TFTBonus>@AllyShieldAmount*100@%</TFTBonus> of the Shield gained.

ability.name: Slicing Maelstrom
ability.description: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield and summon storm of lightning. @NumBolts@ waves of bolts hit enemies within, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage over @Duration@ seconds. The first @MaxStuns@ targets to be struck by @BoltLimit@ bolts are Stunned for @StunDuration@ seconds. Multiple Stuns on the same enemy have @DuplicateStunReduction*100@% effectiveness.

ability.name: Mega Inferno Bomb
ability.description:
Passive: Attacks are replaced with a bomb that bounces @BABounceNumber@ time, dealing @ModifiedBasicAttackDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to units hit.

Active: Throw an enormous bomb at the largest @BombAOERange@-hex group of enemies that explodes on impact, dealing between @ModifiedMinDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) and @ModifiedMaxDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies hit based on their distance from the epicenter.

ability.name: The Darkin Blade
ability.description:
On cast, cycle through one of the following abilities:

Slash in a line, dealing @FirstCastModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to enemies hit and 20% Sundering them for @SunderDuration@ seconds.

Swipe in a cone, dealing @SecondCastModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to enemies hit and knocking them up for @SecondCastStunDuration@ second.

Slam on target, dealing @ThirdCastModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage in a 1 hex circle. Targets below @ThirdCastExecute*100@% max Health are executed.

ability.name: The Relentless Storm
ability.description:
Bite the target and mark them, dealing @ModifiedBiteDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleHealth%) physical damage, increased by @PercentDamageIncrease*100@% if they are already marked. After casting @CastsToTransform@ times, leap to a nearby hex, activating Stormbringer and dealing @ModifiedSlamDamage@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies within a two hex radius.

Stormbringer: Gain @StormbringerBonusHealth@ Health and @StormbringerAS*100@% Attack Speed. Every @BoltCadence@ seconds, summon a lightning bolt on a nearby enemy, dealing @ModifiedBoltDamage@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) magic damage. Takedowns summon a bolt on fallen enemies.

ability.name: Curtain Call
ability.description: For the next 4 attacks, gain infinite range and replace attacks with a cannon shot. Cannon shots deal <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage. The 4th shot deals <TFTBonus>@FourthShotDamageMult*100@%</TFTBonus> more damage.

ability.name: Piltover Customs Special
ability.description: Each item equipped to the invention will determine what it does when it fires.

ability.name: Stolen Might
ability.description:
Cast one of three spells:

Cataclysm: Leap on a nearby enemy. Deal @ModifiedJarvanDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to all enemies within 2 hexes and Stun them for @JarvanStunDuration@ seconds.

Demacian Justice: Deal @ModifiedGarenDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to target. If they are below @GarenExecute*100@% max Health, execute them.

Final Spark: Gain @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Deal @ModifiedLuxDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to all enemies in a line.

ability.name: Runic Overload
ability.description:
Release a runic blast, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage. It splits in two, dealing @SplitPercentDamage*100@% of the damage to the closest two enemies. Each secondary blast splits an additional time.

Bilgewater: Blasts explode on impact, dealing @BilgewaterExplosionPercent*100@% of the damage as physical damage to adjacent enemies.
Demacia: Execute targets below @ModifiedDemaciaExecuteThreshold@ (%i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%) Health.
Freljord: Chill targets for @FreljordChillDuration@ seconds and deal @ModifiedFreljordTrueDamage@ (%i:scaleHealth%) bonus true damage.
Ionia: Blasts split an additional time.
Ixtal: Gain a random Region's effect on combat start and every @ExplorerProcRate@ seconds.
Noxus: Blasts now pierce targets, dealing @NoxusPercentDamageReduction*100@% reduced damage per enemy hit.
Piltover: Every third cast is Overcharged, dealing @PiltoverOverchargePercentBonus*100@% more damage.
Shadow Isles: Increase blast damage by @ModifiedShadowIslesBonusDamage@ (%i:scaleSouls%).
Shurima: Knock up enemies for @ShurimaKnockUpDuration@ second, with a chance to dredge up Gold or Treasures.
Targon: Heal the lowest Health ally for @TargonHealPercent*100@% of the damage dealt.
Void: Ignore @VoidResistIgnore*100@% of enemies' Armor and Magic Resistance.
Yordle: Shrink targets hit, lowering their damage by @YordleDamageReductionPercent*100@% percent for @YordleDamageReductionDuration@ seconds.
Zaun: Poison targets, dealing @ZaunDamage@ magic damage @ModifiedZaunTicks@ (%i:scaleAS%) times over @ZaunPoisonDuration@ seconds.

ability.name: Relentless Pounce
ability.description:
Jump on an adjacent enemy with the lowest health, then deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to them and @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to adjacent enemies. If any die, cast again, dealing @DamageReductionPerCast*100@% damage.

Tanks take @TankDamageMult*100@% more damage from this ability and Fighters take @FighterDamageMult*100@% more.

ability.name: Undying Rage
ability.description:
Become enraged for @Duration@ seconds. While enraged, gain @ModifiedDurability@ (%i:scaleAP%) Durability and attacks are replaced with a strike that deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage. Ignore @ArmorIgnore*100@% of Armor against Chilled enemies.

Bloodsworn Bond: When you field Ashe and Tryndamere, your strongest copies permanently increase their power on kill.Bloodsworn Bond: Gain increased Move Speed. Gain @AttackSpeed_MustMatchTFT16_Tryndamere_PassiveAS*100@% Attack Damage, permanently increased by @TryndASBoostFromAshe*100@% whenever Ashe or Tryndamere score a kill. (Current Bonus: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT16_Tryndamere_PassiveAS*100@%)

{{TFT_Keyword_Chill}}

ability.name: Warp Armor
ability.description: Gain <scaleHealth>@BonusHealth@</scaleHealth> max Health and grow larger. Slam in a @HexRange@ Hex circle on the target, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies hit. For @Duration@ seconds, gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedDurability@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Durability + <TFTBonus>@DurabilityPerEnemy*100@%</TFTBonus> for each enemy targeting this unit.

ability.name: Radiant Eclipse
ability.description:
Passive: While gaining Mana, throw out @NumOfOrbs@ radiant orbs that orbit around target. They deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage in a 1 hex radius and drain @ManaDrainPerSecond@ Mana from enemies hit each second. After draining @ManaAmount@ mana, gain a random Radiant Item. (@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT16_Mel_ManaSpent@/@ManaAmount@)

Active: Detonate orbs on target, causing a @FinalExplosionHexRadius@ hex radius explosion that deals @ModifiedTargetDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to them and @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) damage to all other enemies hit.

ability.name: Collateral Damage
ability.description:
Passive: Attacks fire in a cone on target, dealing @AttackDamageMultiplier*100@% damage to other enemies hit.

Active: Fire an explosive shell at target, dealing @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage split among enemies in a 1 hex circle.

Partners in Crime: When you field Graves and Twisted Fate, both gain bonuses.

ability.name: Impale
ability.description:
Passive: All allies gain @ArmorForAllies@ Armor.

Active: Gain @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Impale up to three nearby enemies in a line, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleArmor%) physical damage and Stunning them for @ImpaleDuration@ seconds.

ability.name: Lunar Rush
ability.description:
Passive: Ability damage from your strongest Leona and strongest Diana marks enemies as Moonlit, reducing their damage by @MoonlightDamageReduction*100@%.

Active: Gain @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Unleash a bolt of lunar energy at the farthest non-Moonlit enemy within @HexLimit@ hexes, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage. Then, dash to all Moonlit enemies, dealing @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to them.

ability.name: Icathian Rain
ability.description: Dash away from all enemies, then fire <scaleLevel>@NumMissiles@</scaleLevel> missiles split across the @NumTargets@ nearest enemies. Each missile deals <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage.

ability.name: Slice and Dice
ability.description: Dash to the farthest enemy within @DashRange@ hexes, dealing <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDashDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to all enemies in the path. Then slash @BaseSlashTimes@ times, each dealing <physicalDamage>@ModifiedSlashDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage. Subsquent casts increase the number of slashes by @NumIncreasePerCastBreakpoint@.

ability.name: Fury of the Sands
ability.description: Steal <trueDamage>@ModifiedHealthSteal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</trueDamage> Health split between the <scaleLevel>@NumEnemies@</scaleLevel> nearest enemies. For @Duration@ seconds, gain <TFTBonus>@Resists@</TFTBonus> Armor and Magic Resist and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamagePerSecond@ (%i:scaleHealth%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies each second.

ability.name: Eye of the Ascendant
ability.description: Launch @NumberOfBlasts@ arcane blasts randomly split between the closest @SpellRangeInEnemies@ enemies that each deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.

ability.name: The Box
ability.description:
Passive: Each second, deal @ModifiedHealthDrain@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleSouls%) magic damage to all enemies within 2 hexes. Heal for @HealthDrainPercentHeal*100@% of the damage dealt by this effect.

Active: Create a prison of walls in a 2 hex radius that lasts @TheBoxDuration@ seconds. While active, the Passive's damage is doubled. When an enemy touches a wall, they take @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage. If there are less than @MinEnemiesInTheBox@ enemies inside The Box at any time, drag an enemy in.

ability.name: Snip Snip!
ability.description: Dash around target and snip <TFTBonus>@ModifiedCastSnipTimes@ (%i:scaleSouls%)</TFTBonus> times, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to them and <magicDamage>@ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> damage to all other enemies in a cone.

ability.name: Endless Rend
ability.description: Summon <TFTBonus>@TotalNumberOfSpears@ (%i:scaleSouls%)</TFTBonus> spears split among the @NumberOfEnemies@ nearest enemies. After a brief delay, they each impale their target, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage and reducing Armor by <TFTBonus>@ArmorReduction@</TFTBonus>.

ability.name: Distortions
ability.description: Summon @NumTargets@ dashing mirror images that strike the target and up to @ModifiedNumTargets@ other nearby enemies. The target takes <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and is Stunned for @StunDuration@ second, while other units hit take <magicDamage>@ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.

ability.name: Blade of the Ruined King
ability.description:
Passive: Gain @ModifiedAttackSpeed@% (%i:scaleSouls%) Attack Speed.

Active: Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to target. For the rest of combat, Viego's attacks deal @ModifiedStackingDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus stacking magic damage.

ability.name: Parallel Convergence
ability.description:
Create a @HexRange@ hex zone around the target that lasts @Duration@ seconds. The next 3 attacks deal @BonusMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) bonus magic damage.

When the zone ends, it deals @MagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage + @DamageRatio*100@% of the target's damage taken during the duration to all enemies in the zone.

ability.name: Traveler's Call
ability.description: Launch @NumMissilesBase@ Meeps at nearby enemies that deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage. Add an additional Meep for each 3-star unit on your board. (Total Meeps: @TFT16_Bard_Num3Stars@)

ability.name: Tumble
ability.description: Tumble to a nearby hex, then fire a bolt at target that deals <trueDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</trueDamage> true damage.

ability.name: Transcendent State
ability.description: For the next @BuffDuration@ seconds, gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedAttackSpeed@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Attack Speed, infinite range, and replace attacks with lasers. Lasers deal <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage in a line, reduced by @DamageReductionPerEnemyHit*100@% for each enemy they pass through. When lasers critically strike, they deal <trueDamage>@BonusCritDamage*100@%</trueDamage> bonus true damage.

ability.name: Nevermove
ability.description:
Passive: Each second, restore @TotalHealing@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) Health and deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies within 1 Hex.

Active: Open a demonic eye on the largest group of nearby enemies, dealing @ModifiedHandDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and Stunning them for @StunDuration@ seconds.

ability.name: Three Talon Strike
ability.description: Strike target 3 times. Each strike deals <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage and restores <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> Health. The final one Stuns for @StunDuration@ seconds.

ability.name: Mourning Mist
ability.description:
Restore @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleSouls%) Health. Throw a globule of black mist at the enemy who has dealt the most damage this combat, preferring unique enemies. It 20% Chills them for @DebuffDuration@ seconds and raises the Mana cost of their next cast by @ManaCostRaise@. It then deals @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleHealth%) magic damage in 1 hex radius.

{{TFT_Keyword_Chill}}

ability.name: Command: Protect
ability.description:
Send the Ball to target, dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and splitting @ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage among enemies within a 1 hex circle.

Then grant @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield to the two lowest Health allies for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

ability.name: Clear The Brush
ability.description: Dash to a nearby hex and swing forward, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to enemies in a @HexDistance@-hex line.

ability.name: Piltover Tussle
ability.description: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. Charge and knock the target backwards, Stunning them and units hit for @KnockupDuration@ seconds and dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to them. After charging, force nearby enemies to target this unit.

ability.name: Static Field
ability.description: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @Duration@ seconds and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleMR%)</magicDamage> magic damage to all enemies within @HexRadius@ hex.

ability.name: Maximum Dosage
ability.description: Bulk up for @Duration@ seconds. While bulked, restore <scaleHealth>@TotalHealing@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth> Health every second and attacks deal <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage.

ability.name: Divine Challenge
ability.description:
Dash around target and slash in a circle, dealing @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to target and @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to all other adjacent enemies hit. If the target doesn't die, immediately cast again.

If this Ability is cast @CastsToUlt@ times in a row, instead slam on target, instantly killing them and dealing @ModifiedBigAOEDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to all enemies within 3 hexes.

ability.name: The Culling
ability.description: Fire <TFTBonus>@TotalNumShots@ (%i:scaleAS%)</TFTBonus> shots towards target. Each shot explodes on the first enemy hit, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to all nearby enemies. If an enemy is afflicted with Black Mist, purify them, immediately draining their Armor for the total amount.

ability.name: You & Me!
ability.description:
Passive: Yuumi joins your strongest Kobuko. Every @YuumiCadence@ seconds, she alternates between healing the lowest Health ally for @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%) Health or granting @YuumiAS@% Attack Speed to the ally who has dealt the most damage for @ASDuration@ seconds.

Active: Dance, restoring @ModifiedSelfHeal@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) Health over @SelfHealDuration@ seconds.

ability.name: Golem Smash
ability.description: Slam the target dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.

ability.name: Swimming Speed
ability.description: <spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive> Occasionally dash around the board.

ability.name: On Duty!
ability.description: The Training Dummy cannot move or attack. It is also dressed like a devilishly handsome Yordle.

ability.name: Primordial Breath
ability.description: <spellPassive>Passive:</spellPassive> Attacks splash in a cone behind the target.
